hero.title: Engineering Student Association
hero.subtitle: Empowering future engineers through innovation and collaboration.

about.title: About Us
about.description: The Engineering Student Association (ESA) is dedicated to fostering a community of innovation, learning, and professional growth for all engineering students. We provide resources, organize events, and advocate for student interests.

initiatives.title: Our Initiatives
initiatives.description: We run various initiatives to support students, including mentorship programs, hackathons, and industry networking events.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I join the ESA?
faq.a1: You can join by registering on our website or visiting our office in the Engineering Building.
faq.a2: We organize workshops, guest lectures, social events, and the annual Engineering Innovation Fair.
faq.q3: How can I contact the ESA?
faq.a3: You can email us at contact@esa-university.edu or use the contact form on our website.

about.title: About ESA
about.missionText: To empower engineering students by providing opportunities for professional development, academic support, and social engagement.
about.visionText: To be the leading student organization that inspires the next generation of engineers to solve global challenges.
